alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 11 at 2:24AM MST until June 12 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT/MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West-southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Above 7000 feet, up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley. In Nevada, Esmeralda, central Nye, and Lincoln counties and the Spring Mountains including Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM PDT/MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Visibilities may be reduced on area roadways due to blowing dust. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous crosswinds expected along Highway 395 in Inyo County on Sunday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high- profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
